1.title: The Black Widow
1.plot: An Atlanta woman calls 911 to report that she has been sexually assaulted and shot her attacker as a result. When police arrive, the alleged assailant is dead. Detective Summer Benton combs through the evidence and finds there might be more to the story.

2.title: Body in a Trunk
2.plot: A missing Atlanta teen turns up dead in the trunk of an abandoned car. Searching for clues, Det. Benton follows the teen's last online activity. In Cincinnati, Det. Mitsch tackles the case of a young man who was killed for giving someone a dirty look.

3.title: The Cell Phone Exchange
3.plot: An aspiring rapper is gunned-down in Atlanta and the search for his killer takes Detective Benton on a multi-state manhunt involving the U.S. Marshals.

4.title: Ten Dollar Homicide
4.plot: A young father is shot and killed while on a late-night walk with a friend in a Cincinnati neighborhood. Detective Jenny Luke is determined to find out if this was a set up or a random act of violence.

5.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
5.plot: When a drug deal leaves one man dead, and another paralyzed from the neck down, Detective Mitsch works diligently to find those responsible. Meanwhile, Detective Benton hunts for the person who murdered a business owner in front of his own home.

6.title: Hall of Mirrors
6.plot: A witness and a suspect have two different, yet believable versions of the same story. Detective Jenny Luke must get to the bottom of who's telling the truth on the night a man visiting from New York was gunned down outside of a Cincinnati bar.

7.title: One Good Witness
7.plot: A young man is gunned down in Atlanta less than a week after his release from prison and Det. Benton must find a witness who is willing to talk. In Cincinnati, Det. Luke hunts for a killer who shot and murdered a teenager in an act of retaliatory violence

imdb.plot outline: INSIDE HOMICIDE takes an honest and unprecedented look at life as a female detective. Explore their unique challenges, share in their hard-earned triumphs and empathize as they struggle to balance personal responsibilities on top of a demanding job. For these women, there's only one goal in mind -the ultimate pursuit of justice.
